App Name: Paramount Live Package Name: co.sansa.ctfld

Brief:

Paramount Live is an immersive educational platform that seamlessly bridges the gap between students and interactive learning. With live classes designed to recreate the dynamic of a traditional classroom, this app revolutionizes the way students engage with their studies, providing tools for collaborative learning, performance tracking, and doubt resolution all at their fingertips.
